description:
Shino gets a weird picture of Tsuda from Kotomi. Everyone finds themselves in swimsuits, with pictures being taken. The Judo team works out after school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sasae Style / Nugi Ato Mokkori / Tatakau Shoujo-tachi
